# [[测试Arch安装环境网络]]
# `cfdisk`
# `mkfs.ext4 /dev/sda[1,2,3,4,]`
# `mkswap /dev/sda*`
# `swapon /dev/sda*`
# `mount /dev/sda* /mnt/{,home/,……}`
# `vi /etc/pacman.d/mirrors`
# `pacstrap /mnt base base-devel vim syslinux net-tools wpa_supplicant netcfg dialog`
# `genfstab -p /mnt >> /mnt/etc/fstab`
# `arch-chroot /mnt`
# `vim /etc/fstab` 加入参数`noauto,x-systemd.automount`

# `syslinux-install_update -iam`
# `pacman -S wqy-microhei`
# `[vi, nano] /etc/locale.gen`
# `locale-gen`
# `hwclock --systohc --utc`
# `mkinitcpio -p linux`
# `passwd`
# `useradd -m -g users -s /bin/bash (username)`
# `passwd (username)`
# `pacman -S sudo`
# `visudo`
# `<C-D>`
# `umount /mnt/{,home/,mnt/}`
# `reboot`
# `hostnamectl set-hostname Archlinux`
# `timedatectl set-timezone Asia/Shanghai`
# `localectl set-locale LANG="zh_CN.UTF-8"`
# `timedatectl set-local-rtc false`

# `reboot`

==== 安装yaourt ====
*yaourt使用中无需root权限*
# `vim /etc/pacman.d/mirrors`
# 加入
{{{
[archlinuxfr]
SigLevel = Optional TrustAll
 Server = http://repo.archlinux.fr/$arch
  }}}
# `pacman -S yajl`
# `pacman -S yaourt`
# `yaourt -Syua`
# `pacman -S yaourt`
